nodes.text: Doshar fields were desert fields located on the planet Florrum. In 22 BBY, Turk Falso, a member of Hondo Ohnaka's Ohnaka Gang, shot down a Republic shuttle carrying Senator Kharrus, Representative Jar Jar Binks, and CC-5869. Kharrus and both clone pilots, including Mack, were killed. The ship crashed in the Doshar fields.
